name: Crashlanded
description:
Description

You've crash landed into a strange planet. Find batteries before your suit's energy runs out!

This game was made by Mors for the 27st GM48 Game Jam in 48 hours. It got the 2nd place in the "graphics" category, and the 7th place in the overall ranking.

The music is composed by Catonator and he's cool.

Controls

Left and Right: Walk

Z: Jump

Down: Fast fall
